entry.title: Omicron Fuels Fresh Surge, Threatening India's Hospitals Anew
entry.content: With less than half of India’s population fully vaccinated and infections rising rapidly, public-health experts warn that the healthcare system is again vulnerable—months after being overwhelmed by a surge of cases.

entry.title: For Dying Towns, the Pandemic Offers Challenges---and Hope
entry.content: For years, the mayors of many towns in Europe have struggled to prevent their communities from dying out as people have migrated to cities, schools have dwindled and businesses have died out.

entry.title: Mystery Surrounds Absence of Kazakhstan's Longtime Leader
entry.content: Since unrest started this week, the 81-year-old former president hasn’t been seen in public and his successor has moved to undermine his authority.
